Title: Dovecot: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Dovecot, the worst of
    which could allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

Background.Text: Dovecot is an open source IMAP and POP3 email server.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Dovecot. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted mail or send a specially crafted IMAP command possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition or an authenticated remote attacker might be able to discover the file system directory structure and access other users’ emails.

Workaround.Text: The information disclosure vulnerability can be mitigated by disabling IMAP hibernation feature which isn’t enabled by default.

P.Text: All Dovecot users should upgrade to the latest version:
